title.english: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign

description:
The story takes place in a world where an unknown virus has killed the entire human population except for children under 13. Those children were then enslaved by vampires. The manga centers on Yuichiro Hyakuya, a human who dreams of becoming strong enough to kill all vampires.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Seraph of the End: El Reino de los Vampiros
เทวทูตแห่งโลกมืด

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Pandemic
tags.description: Prominently features a disease prevalent over a whole country or the world.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Rotoscoping
tags.description: Animation technique that animators use to trace over motion picture footage, frame by frame, to produce realistic action.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1519543115367206913)

Originating from [Kyoto Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/2/). Currently affiliated with [Wit Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).

[Website](http://www.sawanohiroyuki.com/) | [Website (nZk)](http://www.sh-nzk.net) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sawano_nZk) | [Instagram (Official)](https://www.instagram.com/hiroyukisawano.official/) | [Instagram (Personal)](https://www.instagram.com/sawano__hiroyuki/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/SawanoHiroyukiSMEJ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0Riv2KnFcLZA3JSVryRg4y?si=KaE_XDXqSRewfXXsxBNzoA) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/artist/hiroyuki-sawano/156620523) | [Deezer](https://www.deezer.com/artist/1315147) 

Composer and musician represented by VV-ALKLINE since 2017. He was previously with Legendoor from 2006 to 2017. 
Sawano began practicing the piano at an early age, and studied composition, arrangement, orchestration, and piano under Nobuchika Tsuboi from the age of 17.

Active as a composer since 2004, he first gained recognition for his work on the Team Medical Dragon TV drama in 2006. He made his debut as an anime composer in 2006 on [Soul Link](https://anilist.co/anime/854/). In 2009, he released his first solo album *musica*, which included some of his more popular songs done for TV shows. In 2014, he launched a new vocal song project under the name "SawanoHiroyuki[nZk]", producing the first album *UnChild* with [Aimer](https://anilist.co/staff/107859/) as the vocalist under the name SawanoHiroyuki[nZk]:Aimer. Since then his songs under this vocal song project have also been used as the opening and ending themes for various anime.

He has cited [Joe Hisaishi](https://anilist.co/staff/100738/), [Youko Kanno](https://anilist.co/staff/95508/), [Hans Zimmer](https://anilist.co/staff/104669/) and Danny Elfman as major inspirations.

Non-anime role:

• **Xenoblade Chronicles X (music)** 
• **Xenoblade Chronicles X Definitive Edition (music)**

Animator and designer turned director. He's best known for his work as a director throughout the [Attack on Titan](https://anilist.co/anime/16498/) adaptation at [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/), acting as an assistant director for Season 1 before being promoted to series director for Seasons 2 and 3.

Originating from [Bee Train](https://anilist.co/studio/5/). Currently affiliated with [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).

[Website](http://www.sawanohiroyuki.com/) | [Website (nZk)](http://www.sh-nzk.net) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sawano_nZk) | [Instagram (Official)](https://www.instagram.com/hiroyukisawano.official/) | [Instagram (Personal)](https://www.instagram.com/sawano__hiroyuki/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/SawanoHiroyukiSMEJ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0Riv2KnFcLZA3JSVryRg4y?si=KaE_XDXqSRewfXXsxBNzoA) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/artist/hiroyuki-sawano/156620523) | [Deezer](https://www.deezer.com/artist/1315147)

Sawano began practicing the piano at an early age, and studied composition, arrangement, orchestration, and piano under Nobuchika Tsuboi from the age of 17.

Since then his songs under this vocal song project have also been used as the opening and ending themes for various anime.

He has cited [Joe Hisaishi](https://anilist.co/staff/100738/), [Youko Kanno](https://anilist.co/staff/95508/), [Hans Zimmer](https://anilist.co/staff/104669/) and Danny Elfman as major inspirations.

Non-anime role:

• **Xenoblade Chronicles X (music)** 
• **Xenoblade Chronicles X Definitive Edition (music)**
Takafumi Wada is a Japanese Composer.

__[Profile (Legendoor)](http://www.legendoor.com/artist/%E6%A9%98%E9%BA%BB%E7%BE%8E)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/AsamiTachibana)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/achaamiii/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/caffemocha0428)__

A Japanese pianist, composer and arranger affiliated with Legendoor.
